highlighted_content:
Labor & Delivery at Liberty Hospital

Our physicians deliver exclusively at The Birthing Center at Liberty Hospital. The unit is a high-tech facility that includes 24 private rooms, a spa room with a whirlpool tub, a Level II Neonatal Intensive Care Nursery, and 2 C-section rooms. The Birthing Center offers classes on childbirth, breast-feeding, infant massage, baby care, and more.

Centrally located within Clay County Missouri, the Birthing Center is a short drive for anyone living in nearby communities such as Liberty, North Kansas City, Gladstone, Shoal Creek, Staley, or Kearney.

name: Barry Pointe Medical Building
desc: Some of our physicians are also available for appointments at our satellite office located at the Liberty Hospital Specialty Clinic in the Barry Pointe Medical Building.
